results.title: Comparison of the effects on airway conductance of a new selective beta-adrenergic blocking drug, atenolol, and propranolol in asthmatic subjects.
results.text_hl: It is concluded that, in contrast to @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ blocks the beta-receptors in the heart preferentially to those in the lungs, and thus could be given to @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Lung_Diseases_Obstructive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008173 @@@obstructive lung disease@@@.

citations.NLM: Aström H. Comparison of the effects on airway conductance of a new selective beta-adrenergic blocking drug, atenolol, and propranolol in asthmatic subjects. Scand J Respir Dis. 1975;56(6):292-6. PMID: 1221496
